Articles.Content:
I read in the devnotes that you can now search parts by internal tags.  I thought that this might be a good thing to crowdsource, because there are so many relevant tags that could be added to the stock parts.  And who knows, someday we could even tag mod parts!

What do you think?

I think this is a good idea, and if it's not taken up I hope someone makes it a mod. From the looks of things though there are lots of tags, so hopefully their won't be too many missing. Before we crowd sourced we would have to see the full list though, which probably isn't an option.
